attributes.action: Implement laws to make it an offence for dogs to be in public places unless they are wearing a nappy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The good people of Britain have had enough of dog-fouling in our streets. No longer will we tolerate having to play hopscotch on the way to the shops. Dog owners should be compelled to dress their animals in nappies when out in public. Failure to comply would result in a large fine for the owner and destruction (on the spot) of the dog.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
